      • lastVisit

        public java.lang.Object lastVisit(Request request,
                                  java.lang.String doctor_id)
        Query to get the date if the last visit of patient to specific doctor
        Parameters:
        request - : "appointments/lastVisit" ,HashMap params: ("patient_id").
        doctor_id - : the doctor id that need to check the patient last visit for him
        Returns:
        String date of the last visit if exist such last visit , return empty string if no last visit , return null if exception occured.
